meanings.definition: A common pain reliever and fever reducer.
meanings.sent1: I took some paracetamol for my headache.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended paracetamol for my fever.
meanings.sent3: Why did the paracetamol refuse to work on weekends? Because it had too many aches to relieve!
meanings.sent4: The paracetamol was like a superhero, swooping in to save the day from pain and fever.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of paracetamol gleamed on the shelf, promising relief from discomfort.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat mild to moderate pain.
meanings.sent1: My mom always keeps paracetamol in the medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy sells paracetamol over the counter.
meanings.sent3: Why did the paracetamol go to school? To become a pain reliever!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like paracetamol, soothing his heartache.
meanings.sent5: The effect of paracetamol was like a gentle hug, easing the pain away.
